title: Sinai Wedding Vows: You shall have no other gods before me
description:
God brings Israel to Himself, but how can they actually be in relationship? The 10 commandments is the founding document of a unique relational covenant. It is different from other similar documents in the Ancient Near East. It is intended to begin a relationship that is sort of a marriage between God and his people.
